nodes.text: A battle was fought in the Ruusan system between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Republic forces included at least one Venator-class Star Destroyer and at least two Low Altitude Assault Transports, while Separatist forces included at least one Lucrehulk-class Battleship. Around 3 ABY, the Nautolan bounty hunter Nakano Lash hid amongst wreckage from the battle in a 720 light freighter, before being found by fellow bounty hunters Beilert Valance and T'onga.
